ProteinName	Zinc finger CCCH domain-containing protein 15 (DRG family-regulatory protein 1) (Likely ortholog of mouse immediate early response erythropoietin 4)
GeneName	ZC3H15 DFRP1 LEREPO4 HSPC303 HT010 MSTP012 PP730
Length	426
Function	Protects DRG1 from proteolytic degradation (PubMed:19819225). Stimulates DRG1 GTPase activity likely by increasing the affinity for the potassium ions (PubMed:23711155).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Nucleus
